DOC.brief_summary: To gather information on the safety of monotherapy of Casodex® tablets 80 mg, targeting prostate cancer patients who have no history of having received treatment by either endocrine therapy (including surgical castration).
DOC.brief_title: Protocol for the Specified Clinical Experience Investigation on the Single Use of Casodex® Tablet 80 mg
DOC.criteria: Prostate cancer patients who have no history of receiving endocrine therapy (including surgical castration), and who plan to undergo Casodex® tablets monotherapy for not less than 12 months
